properties.name: spring.app.jwtSecret
properties.description: It is the secret key that is used for encryption

properties.name: spring.app.jwtExpirationMs
properties.description: It is the time to expire the user session in milliseconds

properties.name: spring.app.jwtExpirationInMsRememberMe
properties.description: It is the time to expire the user session in milliseconds if the user clicks remember me, typically 30 days
